channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brown University and MIT suspect found dead; identified as former grad student
item.description: During a news conference Thursday, authorities identified the suspect as Claudio Manuel Neves Valente and said he took his own life.

item.title: Australia announces gun buyback plan just days after Bondi Beach attack
item.description: Australia will use a sweeping buyback scheme to "get guns off our streets," Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said Friday.

item.title: Serial killer gets death sentence for string of murders in Phoenix
item.description: Cleophus Cooksey Jr., 43, was found guilty in late September of murder in eight killings.
